main.name: Paul Maliakel
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Paul Maliakel, a digital marketer turned Full Stack developer focussing on MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React.js and Node.js), TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Socket.IO and Redux

education.school: Federal Institute of Science and Technology

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Helping various clients around the world develop their dream projects.

testimonials.text: Paul was a great asset to the team. You give him something to be done. You would expect an acknowledgement that he is working on it, or something of that manner....what comes instead is - It's done! Go-doer, creative, enterprising, passionate - that's Paul for you.
testimonials.user: Krishanu Mukherjee, AVP - Product at ADDA

testimonials.text: Paul is our integration expert. He was able to finish all the tasks on time and a lot more. With a good knowledge of marketing he was instrumental in setup of CRM, Marketing Processes and events.
Paul expertly filled the role for my companyâ€™s marketing team from the beginning, supporting especially with organic growth/SEO. A great hire!
testimonials.user: Jael Martin, Marketing Manager at Timeless & Gapless, Berlin
